mapper.update: update file_house set count = count + 1 where fileSeq = #{fileSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_recommend ( fileIdx, id, recommendYN, ins_dt ) VALUES ( #{fileIdx}, #{id}, #{recommendYN}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select (select count(1) from file_recommend where fileIdx = #{fileIdx} and recommendYN = 'Y') as recommendYcnt ,(select count(1) from file_recommend where fileIdx = #{fileIdx} and recommendYN = 'N') as recommendNcnt
